edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.recordmap

Interface RecordMapInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRecordMap, GNSRecordMap

    public interface RecordMapInterface
    Author:
    Westy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRecord(JSONObject json)
      Add a name record to the database from a JSON Object.
      boolean containsName(String name)
      Returns true if the database contains a name record with the given name.
      void createIndex(String field, String index)
      Creates an index for the field.
      AbstractRecordCursor getAllRowsIterator()
      Returns an iterator for all the rows in the collection with all fields filled in.
      JSONObject lookupEntireRecord(String name)
      Retrieve a name record from the database.
      HashMap<ColumnField,Object> lookupUserFields(String name, ColumnField nameField, ColumnField valuesMapField, ArrayList<ColumnField> valuesMapKeys) 
      void removeMapKeys(String name, ColumnField mapField, ArrayList<ColumnField> mapKeys)
      Remove keys from a field.
      void removeRecord(String name)
      Remove a name record from the database.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecords(ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, Object value)
      Given a key and a value return all the records as a AbstractRecordCursor that have a *user* key with that value.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsNear(ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, String value, Double maxDistance)
      If key is a GeoSpatial field return all fields that are near value which is a point specified as a JSONArray string tuple: [LONG, LAT].
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsQuery(ColumnField valuesMapField, String query)
      Return all the fields that match the query.
      AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsWithin(ColumnField valuesMapField, String key, String value)
      If key is a GeoSpatial field return all fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArray string tuple of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]].
      void updateEntireValuesMap(String name, ValuesMap valuesMap)
      Update all fields in a record.
      void updateIndividualFields(String name, ArrayList<ColumnField> valuesMapKeys, ArrayList<Object> valuesMapValues)
      Update particular fields in a record.

                                             ColumnField nameField,

                                      throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                             FailedDBOperationException
        Parameters:

        nameField - - the field that contains the name of the record
        valuesMapField - - the field that contains all the user fields
        valuesMapKeys - - the user fields to return

        a map of ColumnField to objects

      • selectRecords

        AbstractRecordCursor selectRecords(ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                   String key,
                                   Object value)
                            throws FailedDBOperationException
        Given a key and a value return all the records as a AbstractRecordCursor that have a *user* key with that value.
        Parameters:
        valuesMapField - - the field in the row that contains the *user* fields
        key -
        value -
        Returns:
        an AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • selectRecordsWithin

        AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsWithin(ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                         String key,
                                         String value)
                                  throws FailedDBOperationException
        If key is a GeoSpatial field return all fields that are within value which is a bounding box specified as a nested JSONArray string tuple of paired tuples: [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]].
        Parameters:
        valuesMapField - - the field in the row that contains the *user* fields
        key -
        value - - a string that looks like this [[LONG_UL, LAT_UL],[LONG_BR, LAT_BR]]
        Returns:
        an AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • selectRecordsNear

        AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsNear(ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                       String key,
                                       String value,
                                       Double maxDistance)
                                throws FailedDBOperationException
        If key is a GeoSpatial field return all fields that are near value which is a point specified as a JSONArray string tuple: [LONG, LAT]. maxDistance is in radians.
        Parameters:
        valuesMapField - - the field in the row that contains the *user* fields
        key -
        value - - a string that looks like this [LONG, LAT]
        maxDistance - - the distance in meters
        Returns:
        an AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • selectRecordsQuery

        AbstractRecordCursor selectRecordsQuery(ColumnField valuesMapField,
                                        String query)
                                 throws FailedDBOperationException
        Return all the fields that match the query.
        Parameters:
        valuesMapField -
        query -
        Returns:
        AbstractRecordCursor
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException
